DOC.brief_summary: To examine the effect of ergocalciferol treatment on 25-hydroxyvitamin D and PTH levels in patients with CKD stage 3 and 4
DOC.criteria: Patient with CKD stage 3 or 4 whose 25hydroxyvitamin D levels are below 30 ng/ml and plasma intact PTH levels >70 pg/ml. Patients who are on any form of active vitamin treatment
